Html:
Hi!

I was amazed with this project and trying to use it.

I already downloaded the example e added the BSE.Windows.Forms.dll, GMap.NET.Core, GMap.NET.WindowsForms.dll to my References.

Added a GMapControl and pasted the code like you said in http://www.codeproject.com/KB/miscctrl/GMapNET.aspx

But when I run the application, I keep getting this image.

http://img718.imageshack.us/i/capturehyl.jpg/

How can I fix it?

hey,

i guess you missed to add sqlite dll

Yes, I missed it. Added, but still getting the same error.

I have in my references:

BSE.Windows.Forms.dll,

GMap.NET.Core,

GMap.NET.WindowsForms.dll

Mono.Data.SqliteClient.dll

System.Data.SQLite.dll
what version of framework do you use? if .net4, you need add few line to config file

Thank you!
